content:
Here is the cleaned-up text:

Create an Apex class in Salesforce to call from OmniScript.

Add a Remote Action before, in, or after a Step to load data or send data in the OmniScript. The OmniScript's data JSON is sent as the input.

In the Remote Class field, enter the name of the Apex class that the action calls.
The Apex Class must implement NS.VlocityOpenInterface (NS = the namespace of the Apex class).

In the Remote Method field, enter a method of the class that the Action calls (e.g., validateAddress).

(Optional) Configure additional properties in the Remote Action.

You can also set a Remote Timeout property to change the amount of time before the Action times out.
You can configure Pre- and Post-Transform Data Mapper Interface to run before or after the Remote Action.

Example: In the Troubleshooting OmniScript, the callOut1 Remote Action element calls an external system to check if the asset is still under warranty.
title: OmniScript Remote Action Element
